selections.name: Ned Kelly
selections.reason: Top rated (63) with significant class edge over field. Carries only 119lbs, receiving weight from lower-rated rivals. Recent 2nd places him perfectly for this.

selections.name: Chelsea Rose
selections.reason: Consistent performer (Rating 50) coming off a 2nd. Solid place chance.

selections.name: Marvie
selections.reason: Drawn the rail and consistent recent form (4th, 4th). Maps well.

selections.name: Vanrio
selections.reason: Has back class (Rating 61 previously) but recent form mixed. Capable on best day.

danger_horse.name: Chelsea Rose
danger_horse.reason: The only other runner with consistent recent form figures.

selections.name: Wigmore
selections.reason: Last start winner with 63 rating. 3yo with upside against exposed older horses.

selections.name: Altezza
